title: See you next year
body:
On my smurf.

Flex que released. Went 3-7 in placements. Got Bronze 3. Climbed to Silver 3 before season 7.

7-3 in placements, placed Gold 5.

GG. Thanks for the skin. see you next year.

replies.body:
Nice one man! congrats!

Im jealous as! Gold 5 is the dream!

>For 2017, anyone who achieves Gold rank or higher in either Solo/Duo or Flex queue will receive the Victorious skin, **along with an extra reward for those who manage the climb in both.**

Have you considered getting to Gold in both queues? ; )

Nice one.

Try climbing a bit though.
